summary: Changes the battle AI for the housecarls around.
descriptionHtml:
Messed around with the CK and new was able to do a few neat things.

Lydia- Now a high-elf Thalmor Wizard that will also equip w/e 1h weapon you give her (thalmor armor default)

Iona- Now a little girl vampire ^^ also comes with a buffed version of children\'s clothes because she cannot equip anything else. Uses a 1h weapon and mages with the other

Jordis- Now a dark-elf assassin that loves dual-wielding and using her bow (dark brotherhood outfit)

Argis- Now a big strong orc friend that prefers 2h weapons and comes in the full iron armor set

Calder-Left calder as classic sword+shield to keep it classic but he is aged a little and slightly buffed

New download also comes with bat commands to warp you to each housecarl, just type bat \"housecarl name\" ie: bat lydia. Also a stopcombat bat if you need it



REQUIRED:Delete the old housecarl esps before installing if you\'re using version 1.0. they should al start with the word housecarl followed by the city.
author: Merkin702
